meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a former or earlier style or period.
meanings.sent1: The oldstyle furniture in the house gave it a traditional feel.
meanings.sent2: Her oldstyle dress was passed down from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The oldstyle music player seemed out of place in the modern room.
meanings.sent4: His oldstyle manners made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The oldstyle architecture of the building was truly captivating.

meanings.definition: A typeface characterized by thick serifs and a diagonal stress on the strokes.
meanings.sent1: The book cover used an oldstyle font that was easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The oldstyle font on the poster gave it a classic look.
meanings.sent3: The oldstyle font on the menu made it look like a historical document.
meanings.sent4: The oldstyle font on the signboard added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The oldstyle font on the invitation was both charming and sophisticated.
